title: Pap & Pilchard Tart
directions: Preheat oven to 200 degrees C. Grease a 22cm pie dish.

To make crust; bring water to a boil, add salt, stir in maize meal and cook over low heat, stirring constantly for about 5 minutes until it thickens. Remove from heat and mix in butter, parsley, Â½ cup cheese and egg yolks.
Spoon into pie dish and line base and sides neatly, bake uncovered for about 30 minutes or until crisp and golden.
To make filling: in a bowl mix together, onions, pilchards, herbs, salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Spread mixture onto warm piecrust base and top with sliced tomatoes, sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Mix together eggs and milk and pour over tomatoes. Lower oven temperature to 180 degrees C, bake tart in oven for 25 -30 minutes until set.
ingredients: 5ml (1tsp) salt; 250ml (1 cup) ACE SUPER MAIZE MEAL
1 can (425g) Pilchards in tomato sauce, drained
Flaked salt and freshly ground black pepper
